# Open (Queensrÿche song)

| recorded   = 2003
| studio     = *Robert Lang (Shoreline, Washington)
*The Grove (Seattle, Washington)
| venue      =
| genre      = Hard rock
| length     = 4:32

| writer     = Chris DeGarmo, Geoff Tate, Michael Wilton
| producer   = Queensrÿche
| prev_title = Breakdown
| prev_year  = 1999
| next_title =
| next_year  =
| misc       =
}}
"Open" is a song by the American heavy metal band Queensrÿche. It was released as a single in support of their 2003 album Tribe. This song was featured on the PC port of the 2003 Video Game, True Crime: Streets of LA.
